name: ESSENCE OF TONKIN VIETNAM
description:
This tour to
Vietnam is designed around main attractions of the Tonkin and focused on
authentic contact with the local people, to discover Vietnam heritages through
its most remarkable natural and cultural sites. Journey from Hanoi, discover
Duong Lam ancient village, experience with hill tribe village in their daily
life in Mai Chau. Then travel to explore Tam Coc and finally enjoy a luxury
cruise in Halong Bay.
